name: Twentyseven Global
description:
Twentyseven Global is a consulting and global software development company with offices in Kansas City and Denver. We combine experienced on-shore leadership with a network of offshore delivery centers to produce exceptional results. Our on-shore team is comprised of professionals with proven track records at leading systems integration firms and software companies.
Our offshore development centers provide outstanding software development skills in locations chosen for their cost-effectiveness, stability, availability of English language skills and ability to work with the American culture.
